blogs.title: Why do we use it?
blogs.body: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here',Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
